title: WOO unbanned!
body:
See you in the rift.
I will never get a perma

replies.body: I mean, I'll never get a permaban either, but something tells me what you're saying is wrong.
Good luck on the Rift. I hope your attitude has changed so you won't get banned again.

> [{quoted}](name=elduris,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-16T21:40:21.498+0000)
>
> Good luck on the Rift. I hope your attitude has changed so you won't get banned again.

have you ever gotten chat restricted?
No, I've never been chat restricted.

With that attitude, you _will_ actually get permbanned.

The first time is a warning, the second time is rekt.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:16:23.281+0000)
>
> With that attitude, you _will_ actually get permbanned.
> 
> The first time is a warning, the second time is rekt.

what attitude, all I said was "see you in the rift",
if that offended you then I'm sorry to tell you that this game is not for little children like you
You just proved my point, but i doubt you can see how.
Toxic is as toxic does... why they unbanned you is beyond me... if it is even true.
It was just a 14 day suspension, the next one will come...

> [{quoted}](name=HexaDecimel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:44:49.980+0000)
>
> It was just a 14 day suspension, the next one will come...

wont come

> [{quoted}](name=ReadyxPlayerxOne,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:36:15.976+0000)
>
> Toxic is as toxic does... why they unbanned you is beyond me... if it is even true.

they unbanned me because it was a 2-week ban
Still no one cares.

isn't this yours?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5GEE93KQ-i-get-unbanned-in-2-more-hours

> [{quoted}](name=TheEvilQueen135,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-11-16T22:45:58.335+0000)
>
> isn't this yours?
> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5GEE93KQ-i-get-unbanned-in-2-more-hours

Idk, does it look like mine?

Stay hypocritical, kid

> [{quoted}](name=5v5 Teamfighter,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2016-11-17T03:57:45.741+0000)
>
> Idk, does it look like mine?
> 
> Stay hypocritical, kid

it wasn't hypocritical. it was sarcastic. learn to use words correctly

> [{quoted}](name=TheEvilQueen135,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2016-11-17T14:15:00.148+0000)
>
> it wasn't hypocritical. it was sarcastic. learn to use words correctly

I thought you stalked my posts? you would know I use that phrase for everything regardless if its hypocritical,sarcastic,exaggeration

> [{quoted}](name=5v5 Teamfighter,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=0005000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-18T02:28:30.314+0000)
>
> I thought you stalked my posts? you would know I use that phrase for everything regardless if its hypocritical,sarcastic,exaggeration

1. it was literally one from only two hours before so don't flatter yourself about anyone "stalking" your posts
2. that is still not grammatically correct.
Yes, he's quite persistent, isn't he?

5v5 Teamfighter. I will remrmber that name for tomorrow when you post about your perna ban.

Best of luck!
deserve an upvote ;")

I've gotten a perma ban straight away before and from that i've learned alot. How not to flame or be toxic and how to calm down. But seriously thats kind of like rubbing it in to people who have been perma banned.

Yeah dude I know a guy who has been banned like five times and keeps buying accounts... Well i don't know him anymore because he's so damned toxic that i stopped being his friend over it. He's that type that picks a fight every game, and ints sometimes, will follow a jungler around he doesn't like and steal all his farm, etc etc

> [{quoted}](name=T3H UB3RN07,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:18:43.079+0000)
>
> Yeah dude I know a guy who has been banned like five times and keeps buying accounts... Well i don't know him anymore because he's so damned toxic that i stopped being his friend over it. He's that type that picks a fight every game, and ints sometimes, will follow a jungler around he doesn't like and steal all his farm, etc etc

that's a toxic guy,
not me

> [{quoted}](name=5v5 Teamfighter,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07LOoTaw,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-11-16T20:19:50.724+0000)
>
> that's a toxic guy,
> not me

IDK why you got banned bro, but i'd reccomend you phrase things better, I don't think you meant to come off the way you did. But the way it was written seems less enthusiastic and more entitled

again i don't mean to offend this is honest advice
